statements: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_id, email, segment FROM Customers WHERE segment != 'Standard' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE segment = 'Premium' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM Customers WHERE segment = 'Basic' AND email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, segment FROM Customers WHERE segment = 'Regular' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE segment IN ('Premium', 'Regular') ORDER BY segment, last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, segmentation_category FROM customers WHERE age <= 25;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number, age, segmentation_category FROM customers WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT name, age, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE segmentation_category = 'VIP' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, age, segmentation_category FROM customers WHERE age < 18 OR age > 60 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE customer_segmentation IN ('Gold', 'Silver') ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaign_history WHERE segment_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.segment_name, ch.campaign_date FROM customers c JOIN campaign_history ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id JOIN segments s ON ch.segment_id = s.segment_id WHERE ch.campaign_type = 'Email' ORDER BY ch.campaign_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.segment_name, ch.campaign_date FROM customers c JOIN campaign_history ch ON c.customer_id = ch.customer_id JOIN segments s ON ch.segment_id = s.segment_id WHERE c.customer_email LIKE '%gmail%' ORDER BY ch.campaign_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM customers WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE location LIKE '%York%';

SELECT c.customer_name, s.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC, s.segment_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Email' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE birth_date > '1990-01-01';
SELECT segment_name, criteria FROM segments WHERE segment_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT message_content, created_date FROM messages WHERE campaign_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE birth_date < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(interaction_id) > 5;

SELECT c.campaign_name, m.message_content,  i.interaction_date FROM campaigns c JOIN messages m ON c.campaign_id = m.campaign_id JOIN interactions i ON c.campaign_id = i.campaign_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'click';
